message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $9,500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. Can you meet me there?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $8,200 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Can you consider $8,500? I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
